name: tlx
description: Imagine a light weight combination of JSX, Vue, React, Riot, and HyperApp but using JavaScript template literals.

scripts.prepare: cp ./src/*.js ./browser/ && browserify index.js -o browser/tlx.js && uglifyjs browser/tlx.js -o browser/tlx.min.js && uglifyjs src/tlx-vtdom.js -o browser/tlx-vtdom.min.js && uglifyjs src/tlx-sanitize.js -o browser/tlx-sanitize.min.js && uglifyjs src/tlx-directives.js -o browser/tlx-directives.min.js && uglifyjs src/tlx-component.js -o browser/tlx-component.min.js && uglifyjs src/tlx-state.js -o browser/tlx-state.min.js && uglifyjs src/tlx-template.js -o browser/tlx-template.min.js && uglifyjs src/tlx-polyfill.js -o browser/tlx-polyfill.min.js

author: Simon Y. Blackwell <syblackwell@anywhichway.com> (http://www.github.com/anywhichway)
